member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST
member.summary: Specifies a message to add, remove, or replace an extra server credential for a logon session. The SeTcbPrivilege is required to alter another logon account's credentials.

member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST.MessageType
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that lists the types of messages that can be sent to the Kerberos authentication package by calling the function. This member must be set to KerbAddExtraCredentialsMessage.

member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST.UserName
member.summary: The user name for the credential.

member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST.DomainName
member.summary: The domain name for the credential.

member.name: KERB_ADD_CREDENTIALS_REQUEST.LogonId
member.summary: The logon ID of the credential. The value of this member can be NULL.

summary.para: A value that specifies what to do with the credential. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Add the specified credential to the logon session.
Replace the specified credential in the logon session.
Remove the specified credential from the logon session.
